summary.para: Flags used by the function to specify the non-client area rendering policy.

remarks.para: To use a DWMNCRENDERINGPOLICY value, set the dwAttribute parameter of the function to DWMWA_NCRENDERING_POLICY. Set the pvAttribute parameter to the DWMNCRENDERINGPOLICY value.

summary.para: The non-client rendering area is rendered based on the window style.
The non-client area rendering is disabled; the window style is ignored.
The non-client area rendering is enabled; the window style is ignored.
The maximum recognized value, used for validation purposes.
